data.name: Yonder World: Interview with the Void Demo
data.detailed_description:
Our demo covers the first 13 days of the visual novel to give you a sense of the Yonder World, how it works, and the key characters you will come to meet along the way.


The full release will contain additional scenes and activities for this part of the game. Additionally, the final game product will be more polished upon release.
